name: VR Amazing Roller Coaster Play
description:
VR Amazing Roller Coaster Play is free Virtual Reality adventurous based game in which you can enjoy a complete tour of the 3D virtual Roller Coaster in beautiful view of city and the amazing jungles all around the world starting from the amazon to the lost jungles of china in where most people try to get lost from the world forever,
Features:
- Virtual reality games based on 3D city Environment.
- Gyro-meter based 360 degree rotation based device.
- virtual reality glasses such as 4DUD and Card board VR
- No time Limit, unlimited play and fun
